breakdowns.description: Enables the smart contract to connect to Chainlink functions, retrieve data every 1 minute, mint and tokenize the retrieved data within the Remix 1.5.1 environment, and store the minted data in a CSV file.
conditions: The smart contract must connect to Chainlink functions.
Data must be pulled from Chainlink every 1 minute.
Pulled data must be minted and tokenized.
Minted data must be stored in a CSV.
All data must be accepted; errors are ignored.
